code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Chat.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Chat(_ref){let{history,loading,onSubmit,message,setMessage}=_ref;const formatMessage=text=>{return text.split('**').map((part,index)=>{return index%2===0?part:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:part},index);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[history.length===0&&!loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\xBFC\xF3mo te sientes hoy?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Preg\xFAntale a Emberlight AI lo que necesites"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-messages",children:history.map((log,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message user-message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message-content",children:log.message})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message ai-message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message-content",children:formatMessage(log.response)})})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:"chat-input-area",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"chat-input",placeholder:"Escribe tu mensaje a Emberlight...",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),disabled:loading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"send-button",disabled:loading||!message.trim(),children:loading?"...":"Enviar"})]})]});}export default Chat;
